contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 29, 1959 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh Hymn tune contest - 1st Scottish Gas Board, 2nd Scottish C.W.S., 3rd Carlton Main. March contest - 1st Carlton Main, 2nd Scottish C.W.S., 3rd Scottish Gas Board. 11th annual contest. 9 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:14 p.m. April 14, 2014, 12:53 p.m.
1 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Jack Atherton The Frogs of Aristophanes
2 Cooperation Band Robert Oughton Life Divine
3 Bellshill & District Concert Brass Dugald MacBrayne Diadem of Gold
4 Ransome Band George Hespe The Three Musketeers
5 Grimethorpe Colliery Band Ken Johnson An Epic Symphony
6 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band George Hespe A Downland Suite
7 Barrow Shipyard Band Herbert Sutcliffe An Epic Symphony
8 Bowhill Colliery and District Silver Band Drake Rimmer Scheherazade
8 Tullis Russell Mills Drake Rimmer Tchaikovsky [arr. W. Rimmer]
Withdrawn 55th Old Boys Association Silver Band Unknown
